bio: Adventus Caesennius is a legate in the Imperial Legion. He can usually be found at Castle Dour in Solitude, unless the Stormcloaks win the Civil War and capture Solitude, after which he will completely vanish, as will Captain Aldis. He serves as liaison for General Tullius and Legate Rikke with overlooking Imperial Legion forces in Haafingar Hold.
name: Legate Adventus Caesennius
